p: In a modest, but significant number of cells in the mouse cortex Plcg2 co-localized with a marker of endothelial cells. According to a transcriptomic analysis of cells in the vasculature, Plcg2 seems to be expressed in certain subtypes of endothelial cells, although at lower level than compared to microglia ( http://betsholtzlab.org/VascularSingleCells/database.html [ 43]).
